1525390.name: Eternity Protectors
1525390.description:
...what if we mixed Space Invaders and Zelda's Boss Fights...!?

Short Story:
They are coming. Ready your weapons. Get behind that wall. SHOOT. ... AND RUN!!

Short Description:
  • Use attacks and skills: Use different characters with different attacks and skills!

  • Dodge: Skillfully evade, block or explode enemies' attacks before they reach you.

  • Recruit Allies: Don't fight alone! Allies will help you when you need the most!

  • Interact with the environment: Sometimes the best solution is just to return whatever they throw at you.

Story:
After years of battle, the Tree of Eternity was damaged by a big attack from the Demon Lord, at the cost of his own (resurrectable) life.
Still, the Undead and other chaos creatures are here believing they can give the final blow.
Other living races, watching how the Tree of Eternity is damaged, are trying to capture the fortress, believing they can do a better job on defending the Tree than the current defenders.
You, the Eternal Protector, are here to prove all of them are wrong.

Gameplay:
  • The Eternity Protectors is a 20 minutes session Hero Defense. You play as a single Protector, shooting arrows and summoning magic to banish all creatures trying to invade the Eternity Fortress;
  • Play and unlock many Protectors to defend the Tree of Eternity;
  • Become stronger by defeating bosses and freeing souls of Heroes;
  • Defeat the invaders Summoners to destroy the barrier protecting the invader Boss;
  • Interact with the environment by putting trees on fire, shooting at enemies projectiles, throwing bombs back... and many more;
  • THE GAME HAS NO TEXT. Learn the game by playing and sharing knowledge with the community. There is no "How to survive an entire world's invasion" guidebook.
1525390.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语
